item.text: King David said to the entire assembly: “My son Solomon, the one whom God has chosen, is just an inexperienced young man, and the task is great, for this palace is not for man, but for the Lord God.

So I have made <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">effort</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="03559" class="">provide what is needed</st> for the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, including the <st data-num="02091 02091">gold</st>, <st data-num="03701 03701">silver</st>, <st data-num="05178 05178">bronze</st>, <st data-num="01270 01270">iron</st>, <st data-num="06086 06086">wood</st>,<n id="2" /> as well as a <st data-num="07230" class="">large amount</st> of <st data-num="07718" class="">onyx</st>, <st data-num="04394" class="">settings</st> of <st data-num="068 06320">antimony</st> and <st data-num="07553" class="">other stones</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds of</st> <st data-num="03368" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, and <st data-num="068 07893">alabaster</st>.

<st data-num="05750" class="">Now</st>, to show my <st data-num="07521" class="">commitment</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, I <st data-num="05414" class="">donate</st> my <st data-num="03426" class="">personal</st> <st data-num="05459" class="">treasure</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, in <st data-num="04605" class="">addition</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> that I have already <st data-num="03559" class="">supplied</st> for this <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>.

This includes <st data-num="07969 0505">3,000</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">talents</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">from</st> <st data-num="0211" class="">Ophir</st> and <st data-num="07651 0505">7,000</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">talents</st> of <st data-num="02212" class="">refined</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> for <st data-num="02902" class="">overlaying</st> the <st data-num="07023" class="">walls</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">buildings</st>,
for gold and silver items, and for all the work of the craftsmen. Who else wants to contribute to the Lord today?”
The leaders of the families, the leaders of the Israelite tribes, the commanders of units of a thousand and a hundred, and the supervisors of the king’s work contributed willingly.

They <st data-num="05414" class="">donated</st> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="02568 0505">5,000</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">talents</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07239" class="">10,000</st> <st data-num="0150" class="">darics</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="06235 0505">10,000</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">talents</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="07239 08083 0505">18,000</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">talents</st> of <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>, and <st data-num="03967 0505">100,000</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">talents</st> of <st data-num="01270" class="">iron</st>.
All who possessed precious stones donated them to the treasury of the Lord’s temple, which was under the supervision of Jehiel the Gershonite.
The people were delighted with their donations, for they contributed to the Lord with a willing attitude; King David was also very happy.

David praised the Lord before the entire assembly:

“O Lord God of our father Israel, you deserve praise forevermore!
O Lord, you are great, mighty, majestic, magnificent, glorious, and sovereign over all the sky and earth! You, Lord, have dominion and exalt yourself as the ruler of all.

You are the <st data-num="06440" class="">source</st> of <st data-num="06239" class="">wealth</st> and <st data-num="03519" class="">honor</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="04910" class="">rule</st> over <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st>. You <st data-num="03027" class="">possess</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> and <st data-num="01369" class="">might</st> to <st data-num="01431" class="">magnify</st> and <st data-num="02388" class="">give strength</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st>.<n id="2" />
Now, our God, we give thanks to you and praise your majestic name!
“But who am I and who are my people that we should be in a position to contribute this much? Indeed, everything comes from you, and we have simply given back to you what is yours.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigners</st> and <st data-num="08453" class="">temporary settlers</st><n id="1" /> in your <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st>, as <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> our <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> were;<n id="2" /> our <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> are like a <st data-num="06738" class="">shadow</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="0369" class="">without</st> <st data-num="04723" class="">security</st>.<n id="3" />
O Lord our God, all this wealth, which we have collected to build a temple for you to honor your holy name, comes from you; it all belongs to you.

I <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st>, my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0974" class="">examine</st> <st data-num="03824" class="">thoughts</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07521" class="">are pleased with</st> <st data-num="04339" class="">integrity</st>. With <st data-num="03476" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="03824" class="">motives</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="05068" class="">contribute</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">this</st>; and <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> I <st data-num="07200" class="">look</st> with <st data-num="08057" class="">joy</st> as your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> who have <st data-num="04672" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st> <st data-num="05068" class="">contribute</st> to you.
O Lord God of our ancestors Abraham, Isaac, and Israel, always maintain these motives of your people and keep them devoted to you.
Make my son Solomon willing to obey your commands, rules, and regulations, and to complete building the palace for which I have made preparations.”

David told the entire assembly: “Praise the Lord your God!” So the entire assembly praised the Lord God of their ancestors; they bowed down and stretched out flat on the ground before the Lord and the king.

The next day they made sacrifices and offered burnt sacrifices to the Lord (1,000 bulls, 1,000 rams, 1,000 lambs), along with their accompanying drink offerings and many other sacrifices for all Israel.

They held a feast before the Lord that day and celebrated.

Then they designated Solomon, David’s son, as king a second time; before the Lord they anointed him as ruler and Zadok as priest.
Solomon sat on the Lord’s throne as king in place of his father David; he was successful and all Israel was loyal to him.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">officers</st> and <st data-num="01368" class="">warriors</st>, <st data-num="01571" class="">as well as</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">pledged</st> their <st data-num="03027">allegiance</st> <st data-num="08478">to</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>.<n id="1" />
The Lord greatly magnified Solomon before all Israel and bestowed on him greater majesty than any king of Israel before him.
David son of Jesse reigned over all Israel.

He <st data-num="03117 0834 04427">reigned</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">forty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>; he <st data-num="04427" class="">reigned</st> in <st data-num="02275" class="">Hebron</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> and in <st data-num="03389 04427">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st>-<st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> years.

He <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st> at a <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="07872" class="">old age</st>, having <st data-num="07649">enjoyed long</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="06239" class="">wealth</st>, and <st data-num="03519" class="">honor</st>.<n id="1" /> His <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="04427 08478">succeeded</st> him.

<st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David’s</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">accomplishments</st>, from <st data-num="07223" class="">start</st> to <st data-num="0314" class="">finish</st>, are <st data-num="02009 03789">recorded</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="01697" class="">Annals</st> of <st data-num="08050" class="">Samuel</st> the <st data-num="07200" class="">prophet</st>, the <st data-num="01697" class="">Annals</st> of <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="01697" class="">Annals</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st> the <st data-num="02374" class="">prophet</st>.<n id="1" />
Recorded there are all the facts about his reign and accomplishments, and an account of the events that involved him, Israel, and all the neighboring kingdoms.
